isis.stitle: No Idle APU/HVAC System - Troubleshooting - HVAC System

note.para: Compressor and refrigerant loops are sealed and are not serviceable. If a failure occurs within the refrigerant loop or one of its components, the entire sealed loop must be replaced.

para.emph: No operation at all (power at controller)

item.para: No function selected on control panel - Select HEAT or COOL function on control panel.
Selected temperature is insufficient - Adjust temperature.
No power - Tripped circuit breaker(s) / no power source (generator / shore power)
Cool function not activated - Select COOL function on control panel.
Selected temperature too high - Adjust temperature.
Clogged / dirty evaporator filter - Clean / replace.
Faulty evaporator blower - Test and replace.
Blown condenser fan fuse - Replace.
Faulty condenser fan - Test and replace.
Clogged / dirty condenser coil - Clean.
Faulty condenser fan driver - Replace.
Blocked or insufficient return air - Unblock / increase return air.
Evaporator coil frozen up - Defrost.
Excessive heat transfer through cab windows - Close curtains.
Insufficient or leaking ducting - Increase or repair ducting.
Outlet temperature sensor failure - Test and replace.
Refrigerant temperature sensor failure - Test and replace.
Insufficient refrigerant - Test and replace.
Heat function not activated - Select HEAT function on control panel.
Selected temperature too low - Adjust temperature.
Clogged / dirty evaporator filter - Clean / Replace.
Faulty evaporator blower - Test replace.
Blocked or insufficient return air - Unblock / increase return air.
Tripped HVAC 2 breaker - Reset breaker.
Faulty heater coil - Test and replace.
Insufficient or leaking ducting - Increase / repair ducting.
Faulty thermal breaker(s) - Test and replace.
Outlet temperature sensor failure - Test and replace.
